narrative.title: 1St Greek Brigade - 1942Q3
narrative.situation: British infantry_brigade deployed in North Africa during 1942Q3.
narrative.objectives: Infantry brigade for static defense, integrated into British 50th Division operations at El Alamein northern sector
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.
